data.name: STASIS Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
In collaboration with Mark Morgan, the maestro behind Fallout®, Fallout 2®, and Planescape: Torment®, THE BROTHERHOOD presents the dark soundtrack of STASIS.

Morgan's overture for the Maracheck family is extraordinarily ambient and haunting.

Daniel Sadowski, composer on Counter-Strike®, CALL OF DUTY: GLOBAL OPERATIONS® and DOTA 2® has also participated in crafting the dark tones of this dystopian world.

The album covers 21 tracks delivered in high-quality MP3 (320kbps CBR) and an HQ FLAC mastering is included.

It will become a cherished part of your collection.
